description.jp:
ユウナが召喚士としての旅を終えた後 
スフィアハンターとしての冒険をする
仲間になった「カモメ団」のメンバー。
クールで自分のことを語らず 過去を
詮索されるのを嫌うため謎が多いが 
仲間への思いやりはある模様。
口癖は「シメる」と「ひんむく」。
description.gl: A fellow sphere hunter who accompanies Yuna in the Gullwings after the summoner had concluded her previous journey. Reticent when it comes to talking about herself、 she does not take kindly to people poking into her past、 but does care for her comrades.

jp.text: じゃ シメてひんむくか
ここなら悲鳴はどこにも届かないな
いいから帰ろう とにかく帰ろう すぐ帰ろう
しかし 放ってはおけないユウナであったと
悪いけど 手伝わせるよ

gl.text: No one's gonna hear you scream from down here.
Don't ask、 just run. Run now. Run fast.
Well、 Yuna? You're the one who wanted to do something.
By the way、 you'll be helping.

name.jp: コールアビリティ_パイン

desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

desc.en:
2-HIT BRV attack.
Inflicts Status Break for 3 turns to target.
Grants 1 stack of Dressphere for 6 turns (max is 5).
Status Break lowers Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack, Defense and Speed.
Dressphere has the following inclusive effects:
• At 1 stack, raises Max BRV.
• At 2 stacks, raises Speed.
• At 3 stacks, raises Defense.
• At 4 stacks, raises Initial BRV.
• At 5 (max) stacks, raises Attack.

desc.en:
6-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.
Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with Status Break.
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.
HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.
Turns to Dancing Sword+ while Dressphere V is active.
desc.gl:
6-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Status Break
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Becomes Sword Dance+ with 5 levels of Dressphere

- BRV attack hit count becomes 3.

- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.
- Extends the duration of Status Break by 2 turns.
- Triggers an HP attack after use.

While Dressphere is active:
- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.
- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency increase.
